name: Jquery.magnizoom
body: # jQuery Magnizoom Magnify images with ease. A no-brainer with touch support. # [DEMO](http://bleech.github.com/jquery.magnizoom) ## Getting Started Download the [production version][min] or the [development version][max]. [min]: https://raw.github.com/bleech/jquery.magnizoom/master/dist/jquery.magnizoom.min.js [max]: https://raw.github.com/bleech/jquery.magnizoom/master/dist/jquery.magnizoom.js ### Markup ```html
